name: parse_rosout_and_tag
short_description: Add tags to a dataset by parsing the /rosout topic in rosbags.
description: This Action adds tags to a dataset by parsing the /rosout topic and checking for user-provided substrings.

parameters.name: KEYWORD_DICT
parameters.description: Dictionary with keys and values. The key specifies the tag that will be applied to the datasets if /rosout contains the value.
